author: scottbw
msg: Improved code comments for widget upload, and conduct checks for valid .wgt files in the upload. Also added some basic functional tests (unauthorized upload, valid upload, upload with wrong type of file). Note that POSTing URLs rather than files (e.g. for Shindig gadgets) is not yet implemented.

author: rhirsch
msg: [ESME-340] General Task to perform release associated tasks
